about_the_game:
Players who purchase this DLC will receive exclusive artworks as a token of our appreciation for your generosity. The artworks will include original pictures, character design sketches, conceptual art, and more.

These premium images are perfect for adding a touch of magic to your computer desktop as stunning HD wallpapers. All images included in this package are rendered in exquisite detail, with resolutions ranging from 1536x1536 to an impressive 2704x2704.

For Henzo:

20 stunning HD artworks featuring the main character.
See Henzo like never before with original character designs, action poses, and more.

For Willie:

20 breathtaking HD artworks showcasing the fearless mage.
Discover new sides to Willie's character with never-before-seen concept art and illustrations.

For Lenna:

20 mesmerizing HD artworks featuring the powerful futuristic sorceress.
Immerse yourself in Lenna's magical world with concept sketches and original character designs.

For Aizack:

20 epic HD artworks showcasing the macabre scientist
Get up close and personal with Aizack through original character designs and dynamic action scenes.

Thank you for playing Heroes of Time! If you've enjoyed the game and would like to show your appreciation for the hard work that went into making it, please consider purchasing the Developer Support DLC.

By buying this DLC, you'll be helping to support the development of future expansions and continuations of the game.

I appreciate your generosity and will continue to work hard to bring you more exciting adventures in the world of Heroes of Time. Thank you again for your support!
detailed_description:
Collector's Edition

Guide: How to Access the DLC Content 1 - Purchase the DLC from the Steam store. 2 - Once the purchase is complete, make sure to update the game to the latest version. 3 - Navigate to the installation folder of the base game. 4 - Locate the folder with the name of the DLC you purchased. 5 - Open the DLC folder and explore the exclusive content, including the high-quality artworks.


About the Game

Players who purchase this DLC will receive exclusive artworks as a token of our appreciation for your generosity. The artworks will include original pictures, character design sketches, conceptual art, and more. These premium images are perfect for adding a touch of magic to your computer desktop as stunning HD wallpapers. All images included in this package are rendered in exquisite detail, with resolutions ranging from 1536x1536 to an impressive 2704x2704. For Henzo: 20 stunning HD artworks featuring the main character. See Henzo like never before with original character designs, action poses, and more. For Willie: 20 breathtaking HD artworks showcasing the fearless mage. Discover new sides to Willie's character with never-before-seen concept art and illustrations. For Lenna: 20 mesmerizing HD artworks featuring the powerful futuristic sorceress. Immerse yourself in Lenna's magical world with concept sketches and original character designs. For Aizack: 20 epic HD artworks showcasing the macabre scientist Get up close and personal with Aizack through original character designs and dynamic action scenes. Thank you for playing Heroes of Time! If you've enjoyed the game and would like to show your appreciation for the hard work that went into making it, please consider purchasing the Developer Support DLC. By buying this DLC, you'll be helping to support the development of future expansions and continuations of the game. I appreciate your generosity and will continue to work hard to bring you more exciting adventures in the world of Heroes of Time. Thank you again for your support!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows7
  • Processor: Intel Core Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphic board that works with OpenGL 4.4 or higher
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Install it on C:

short_description: This DLC contains 80 HD artworks/wallpapers as a way to give back and show your gratitude for the game.
supported_languages: English, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Japanese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America
